meanings.definition: Relating to a meal or the act of eating.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed a prandial gathering around the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: The prandial habits of the community were quite traditional.
meanings.sent3: The prandial etiquette at the fancy restaurant was amusingly strict.
meanings.sent4: The prandial atmosphere in the bustling cafeteria was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread created a prandial ambiance in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Happening or occurring during a meal.
meanings.sent1: The prandial conversation at the table was lively and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The prandial interruption by the phone was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The prandial spill of the drink caused a moment of chaos.
meanings.sent4: The prandial laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The prandial clinking of glasses signaled the start of the feast.
